long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Dropshipping Business with Fiidom AI.

Fiidom automates your tasks, saving you time and helping you work smarter. The Fiidom Chrome Extension lets you analyze competitor stores and quickly find the best dropshipping products on AliExpress. Additionally, with the Fiidom app on Shopify, you can effortlessly optimize product descriptions and titles, and receive price recommendations to stay competitive and profitable. It also seamlessly integrates with Shopify and top dropshipping apps.

âœ¨ Use Fiidom for Chrome To:

âœ” Find Better Products Automatically: Our AI crawls AliExpress to discover better listings with better prices, shipping times, and reviews.
âœ” Analyze Shopify Stores in Full: Get detailed analysis of competitor Shopify stores, including best-selling products, traffic, revenue, keywords, and ads.

âœ” Competitive and Profitable Pricing Suggestions: Maximize your profit with pricing recommendations based on competitiveness, revenue potential, profit margins, and more.
âœ” Seamless Integration with Your Dropshipping Apps: Use Fiidom directly on your dropshipping apps.

âž¤ How It Works:

âœ¨ Fiidom for Chrome:
1. Install the Fiidom Chrome extension.
2. Sign up with your Google or Shopify account.
3. Browse AliExpress products and click the Fiidom bar or icon on the right to see product insights.
4. Visit any Shopify store, select a product, and click the Fiidom bar or icon on the right to reveal store and product insights.
